Episodes.Title: Neutopia
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, J. Stewart Burns
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: To avoid an imminent bankruptcy, the "Planet Express" is converted into an airline company, but on its the first flight the airliner crash-lands on a strange planet.

Episodes.Title: Benderama
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Aaron Ehasz
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Professor invents a device that creates two half-sized duplicates of any object. Bender uses this device to create copies of himself, so he doesn't have to work, but things quickly get out of control.

Episodes.Title: Ghost in the Machines
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Patric M. Verrone
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry believes that a human life is more important than a robot life, so Bender decides to kill himself again, only this time he really follows through. But instead of dying he turns into a ghost that haunts Fry.

Episodes.Title: Law and Oracle
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Josh Weinstein
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry realizes he's stuck in a dead-end job, so he quits and enrolls in the police academy.

Episodes.Title: The Silence of the Clamps
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Rogers
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Bender testifies in open court against Donbot, and has to go into Witness Relocation Program, because the entire robot mafia is now after him.

Episodes.Title: Yo Leela Leela
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Against all odds, Leela manages to write a successful children's story, which becomes a huge TV hit.

Episodes.Title: All the Presidents' Heads
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Josh Weinstein
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The crew changes the outcome of the American revolution when they travel back in time.

Episodes.Title: Möbius Dick
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Dan Vebber
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: While traveling through the Bermuda Tetrahedron, the crew encounters a giant four-dimensional space whale.

Episodes.Title: Fry Am the Egg Man
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Michael Rowe
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Leela buys some alien eggs, and Fry decides to hatch one of them instead of eating it, hoping to get a pet bird, but gets something else instead.

Episodes.Title: The Tip of the Zoidberg
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The Professor consistently refuses to fire Zoidberg, despite his complete incompetence in medicine. The reason for such devotion is finally revealed.

Episodes.Title: Cold Warriors
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Dan Vebber
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry gets the common cold, which is bad news for 31st century Earth, where the common cold has been extinct for so long, no one is immune to it.

Episodes.Title: Overclockwise
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Cubert overclocks Bender's CPU to make him more powerful, but that creates some unexpected results. Meanwhile, Leela decides to dump Fry and move on.

Episodes.Title: Reincarnation
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Aaron Ehasz
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The gang is reincarnated as 1930s black and white cartoons, 1980s Saturday morning television characters, and Japanese anime heroes.
